name: mobile-grooming-server
description: Backend API for mobile grooming business management

scripts.build:prod: npm run build && echo 'Server build completed ✅'
scripts.db:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI).then(() => { console.log('✅ MongoDB connection successful'); process.exit(0); }).catch((err) => { console.error('❌ MongoDB connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
